name: io.github.sidart10/submagic-mcp-server
description: AI-powered video editing server with automatic captions in 107 languages, magic zooms, B-rolls, silence removal, and viral clip generation. Integrates with Submagic API for professional social media content creation.
features: Automatic AI captions in 107+ languages with 98%+ accuracy
Magic zooms - AI-powered dynamic emphasis effects
Magic B-rolls - Auto-insert stock footage from Storyblocks
Silence removal with 3 speed presets (natural, fast, extra-fast)
Bad takes removal - AI removes filler words ('um', 'uh', 'like')
Custom B-roll insertion at exact timestamps
Magic clips - Auto-generate viral clips from YouTube videos
